Yonkers.Kingsbridge, Bronx: Kingsbridge is a working- and middle-class residential neighborhood geographically located in the northwest portion of The Bronx, in New York City. Kingsbridge actually comprises three distinct neighborhoods: Kingsbridge proper, Kingsbridge Heights, and Van Cortlandt Village. The neighborhood is considered a part of Bronx Community Board 8 and is sometimes considered a sub-section of Riverdale.
